document.id: City of American Canyon, Cal., Ord. No. 2007-04
document.heading: AN ORDINANCE OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON, CALIFORNIA, AMENDING CHAPTER 5.12 OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE BY AMENDING SECTION 5.12.140 REGARDING THE SETTING OF WAGERING LIMITS AT CARDROOMS IN ORDER TO COMPLY WITH CURRENT CALIFORNIA STATE LAW (BUSINESS & PROFESSIONS CODE SECTION 19860); AND AMENDING SECTION 5.12.080.B OF THE CITY OF AMERICAN CANYON MUNICIPAL CODE TO UPDATE A REFERENCE TO A RENUMBERED SECTION OF THE BUSINESS & PROFESSIONS CODE
